Release Notes for I-CUBE-LRWAN SubGHz Physical Layer Middleware

Purpose

This Middleware provides the SubGHz Physical Layer for products supported in the I-CUBE-LRWAN FW Package. This covers the following radios

  • sx1272 from Semtech

  • sx1276 from Semtech

  • sx126x from Semtech

Update History

Main Changes

Update radio drivers according to Semtech release v4.4.7

Integrate Semtech’s latest updates for sx126x radio driver

Change SX1272 and SX1276 FSK FIFO threshold from 15 to 31 in order to give more time for the MCU to make other processing tasks


Main Changes

First Release


For complete documentation on STM32, visit: [www.st.com/stm32]

This release note uses up to date web standards and, for this reason, should not be opened with Internet Explorer but preferably with popular browsers such as Google Chrome, Mozilla Firefox, Opera or Microsoft Edge.
